keys: diagrama da parte dianteira de onda
schema della parte anteriore di onda

          <title>
            <string language="en">Wave front diagram of refracted waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Frontseite Diagramm der refracted Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de front d'onde des vagues 
réfractées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama da parte dianteira de onda de ondas 
refracted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema della parte anteriore di onda delle onde 
refracted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπροστινό διάγραμμα κυμάτων των διαθλασμένων κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama del frente de onda de ondas refractadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This wave front diagram shows what happens to plane waves in water as these pass through the interface of shallow and deep waters.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refracted ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refracted waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ripples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slowing down</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave front diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave patterns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Wave refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Welle Frontseite Diagramm zeigt, was 
flachen Wellen im Wasser geschieht, während diese durch die 
Schnittstelle des flachen und tiefen Wassers überschreiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme de front d'onde montre ce qui arrive
aux ondes planes dans l'eau pendant que ceux-ci traversent l'interface
des eaux peu profondes et profondes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama da parte dianteira de onda mostra o
que acontece às ondas planas na água enquanto estes passam através 
da relação de águas rasas e profundas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema della parte anteriore di onda 
mostra che cosa accade alle onde piane in acqua mentre questi 
attraversano l'interfaccia delle acque poco profonde e profonde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μπροστινό διάγραμμα κυμάτων εμφανίζει τι 
συμβαίνει στα επίπεδα κύματα στο ύδωρ καθώς αυτά περνούν μέσω 
της διαπροσωπείας των ρηχών και μεγάλων θαλασσίων βαθών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama del frente de onda muestra qué 
sucede a las ondas planas en agua mientras que éstos pasan a través 
del interfaz de aguas bajas y profundas.</string>
          </description>
